title: The Ghost of Sierra de Cobre (TV Movie 1964) Martin Landau, Diane Baker

sources.title: The Ghost of Sierra de Cobre (TV Movie 1964) Martin Landau, Diane Baker
sources.description: Nelson Orion (Martin Landau), an architect by profession and paranormal investigator by passion, is hired by heiress Vivia Mandore (Diane Baker), who mistakenly believes she has been freed from the domination of her recently deceased mother-in-law. But the old woman is determined to continue her control... from beyond the grave.
